item.title: Eric Adams torches Harris, Dems for blasting Maduro arrest as Mamdani fumes ‘act of war’
item.description: Eric Adams slams fellow Democrats over Trump's Maduro capture, calling out Harris and Biden's "cynical" response to Venezuelan dictator's detention.

item.title: Klobuchar weighing run for Minnesota governor as Walz ends re-election bid amid fraud scandal

item.title: Florida GOP lawmaker blasts Democrats' Venezuela response as 'Trump Derangement Syndrome'
item.description: Florida Rep. Mike Haridopolos accuses Democrats of "Trump Derangement Syndrome" over their criticism of Venezuela strikes that captured Nicolás Maduro...

item.title: Taxpayers could foot 'historically unusual' pension for Biden, report finds
item.description: Former President Joe Biden could collect up to $417,000 in annual pension benefits, according to National Taxpayer Union Foundation estimates.
